title: Exploring the therapeutic potential of silymarin-based herbal remedy (prebiotic) and probiotic blend in a mouse model of NAFLD: Insights into gut microbiota modulation and liver health
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Tanya Ralli, Shahnawaz Ahmad, Zoya Saifi, Abdulsalam Alhalmi, Vidhu Aeri, Mohd Aqil, Kanchan Kohli
